response.job_title: System Administrator at SCADA Siemens Projects | Electronic Engineer Universidad nacional de Colombia. Electrical Engineer Universidad Nacional de Colombia
response.summary:
Electronic Engineer and Electrical Engineer with over 2 years of experience in SCADA systems. I have worked with Linux OS, network devices like switches and firewalls, use of GIT and server administration. Proficient in various programming languages such as python, C++, JavaScript, and SQL/MySQL databases.  
My expertise includes designing and commissioning of SCADA systems,  servers’ administration, managing network devices, use of GIT, ORACLE  database administration and Linux OS administration. I am experienced with Agile methodologies using tools as Jira for process tracking. 
Interested in areas as cibersecurity, Linux server administration and programming. With analysis capacity, co-working, agile and proactive professional with leadership, decision-making and a great willingness and facility for always learning, with special interest in face new challenges, especially in new technological areas with focus in agile methodologies.  I know customer is an important key in every business, I like to work near of them.
response.skills: Comunicación, backend, Programación orientada a objetos (POO), Metodologías ágiles, Linux, Energía, Programación, Automatización industrial, Software, AutoCAD, Capacidad de análisis

profile_positions.description:
Designing, engineering, and commissioning of SCADA systems for generation control, and managing of transmission and distribution networks. As a system engineer, I have set up network devices like switches and firewalls, designing and managing communication network. I have created virtual machines in VMWare and KVM and I have managed servers with Windows server and Red Hat Enterprise. I manage cybersecurity over SCADA systems, creating users, managing firewall and server policies. Use of scripting to automate activities on Linux servers with python. As a System Administrator I manage GIT code and ORACLE databases for SCADA application. 
SCRUM is the framework used in company projects; I am part of an agile team as a developer. I have made SAT and FAT tests, with proximity to the customer.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer - SCADA

profile_positions.description: As an analyst I supported servers and applications for bank offices. In monitoring I set up servers and communication devices (switches), I handled incidents related with computer and communication networks, managing servers with Windows server and Cisco switches.
profile_positions.title: Support and monitoring analyst

profile_positions.description: As an internship student, I helped with the distribution network updating process, designing planes for the network in AUTOCAD and loading changes on ENEL – CODENSA page. I made the management and control for data base related with technical evaluations of electrical devices used by the company.
profile_positions.title: Intership Student

profile_positions.description: Design, development and assembly of a system automation for cameras in high security vaults. Use of digital devices like microcontrollers, sensors and digital plates. Development in C language programming and design of digital circuit plates.
profile_positions.title: Responsible in process automation

company.name: Siemens
company.description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.
